de.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Um Bilder zu speichern, benötigt Integreat Zugriff auf die Galerie.
de.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Um nahegelegene Orte zu finden, benötigt Integreat Zugriff auf den Standort.

ar.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: لحفظ الصور، يحتاج تطبيق إنتجريت الوصول إلى المعرض.

en.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Integreat wants to save photos to your library.
en.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Integreat wants to use your location to find nearby cities.

es.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Para guardar imágenes, Integreat necesita un acceso a la galería.

fa.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: برای ذخیره تصاویر، Integreat نیاز به دسترسی به گالری دارد.

fr.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Pour enregistrer des photos, Integreat doit accéder à votre galerie.

hr.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Za pohranjivanje slika Integreat mora imati pristup galeriji.

ku.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Jibo zexîrekirin anku xwedankirina wêneyan, Integreat hewcetî bi têketina nav Galeriyê heye.

pl.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Aby zapisać obrazy, Integreat potrzebuje dostępu do galerii.

ro.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Pentru a stoca imagini, Integreat are nevoie de acces la galerie.

ru.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Чтобы сохранить снимки, приложению Integreat требуется доступ к галерее изображений.

so.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Si loo keydiyo sawirada, Integreat waxay u baahan tahay inay marin u hesho keydka sawirada.

ti.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: ስእልታት ንምዕቃብ፡ Integreat ናብቲ ጋለሪ/መኽዘን ስእሊ ናይ ምእታው ፍቓድ የድልዮ።

tr.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Resimleri kaydedebilmek için Integreat'in galeriye erişimi gerekmektedir.
